feed.title: Example podcast site
feed.subtitle: This is an example of a site with podcast feeds

entry.title: Second Podcast
entry.content:
This post is in the podcast category so it will be included in your podcast RSS feeds. (You can see the feed subscribe links at the bottom of the page.)

It also includes an audio tag so people visiting the blog can play it directly:

Your podcast posts must contain metadata like this:

podcast_link: /audio/my-first-podcast

Notice that there is no file extension on the link - it will be added based on the type of feed (ogg or mp3).

Put your audio files inside the audio/ directory and add the link to the blog post for that podcast.
entry.summary: This post is in the podcast category so it will be included in your podcast RSS feeds. (You can see the feed subscribe links at the bottom of the page.)

entry.title: Another post
entry.content: This post is not in the podcast category so it will not be included in your podcast RSS feeds.
entry.summary: This post is not in the podcast category so it will not be included in your podcast RSS feeds.
